text:
@realDonaldTrump Pres. Trump has spent the last 2 months blaming everyone for not being told or knowing earlier about CORONAVIRUS!
Completely downplaying the severity.
ONGOING DISCUSSIONS SINCE JAN 12th!
Think about that!
How many lies, downplaying & blame has been directed?
#TrumpLiedPeopleDied https://t.co/0zY9pJXCRU

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
